TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit BitVector32 extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供在 32 位元記憶體中儲存布林值 (Boolean) 和小整數的簡單結構。

span.span: Provides a simple structure that stores Boolean values and small integers in 32 bits of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更有效率布林值，會在內部使用的小整數。 is more efficient than for Boolean values and small integers that are used internally. A可以無限期地視需要成長，但它具有類別執行個體所需的記憶體和效能負擔。A can grow indefinitely as needed, but it has the memory and performance overhead that a class instance requires. 相反地，使用只有 32 位元。In contrast, a uses only 32 bits. A結構以包含小整數的區段或位元旗標的布林值，但不是能同時設定。A structure can be set up to contain either sections for small integers or bit flags for Booleans, but not both. A是一種視窗到並所組成可以包含在指定的最大值的連續位元最小數目。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 比方說，包含最大值為 1 的區段組成只有一個位元，，而 5 與最大值的區段組成三個位元。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 您可以建立最大值是 1，以做為布林值，因此您就可以將整數和布林值儲存在相同。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . 可用於某些成員設定為區段，雖然您可以使用其他成員已設為位元旗標的其中一個。Some members can be used for a that is set up as sections, while other members can be used for one that is set up as bit flags. 例如，屬性是索引子章節中，以設定和屬性是索引子為位元旗標設定。For example, the property is the indexer for a that is set up as sections, and the property is the indexer for a that is set up as bit flags. 建立一系列的遮罩，可用於存取中的個別位元為位元旗標設定。 creates a series of masks that can be used to access individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags. 在使用遮罩設定區段可能會導致非預期的結果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用為位元旗標的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of bit flags. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/CPP/bitvector32_bitflags.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/CS/bitvector32_bitflags.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/VB/bitvector32_bitflags.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例使用為區段的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of sections. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CPP/bitvector32_sections.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CS/bitvector32_sections.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/VB/bitvector32_sections.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 CreateMask() cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateMask () As Integer

summary.span: 建立一系列遮罩中的第一個遮罩，可以用於擷取設定為位元旗標之 中的個別位元。

span.span: Creates the first mask in a series of masks that can be used to retrieve individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags.

returns.span: 遮罩，隔離 中的第一個位元旗標。

span.span: A mask that isolates the first bit flag in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`CreateMask()`數列中建立的第一個遮罩和`CreateMask(int)`所有後續的遮罩。Use `CreateMask()` to create the first mask in a series and `CreateMask(int)` for all subsequent masks. 可以建立多個遮罩，可參考相同的位元旗標。Multiple masks can be created to refer to the same bit flag. 產生的遮罩隔離中的只有一個位元旗標。The resulting mask isolates only one bit flag in the . 您可以結合使用位元 OR 運算，建立隔離的多個中的位元旗標遮罩遮罩。You can combine masks using the bitwise OR operation to create a mask that isolates multiple bit flags in the . 在使用遮罩設定區段可能會導致非預期的結果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和使用遮罩。The following code example shows how to create and use masks. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CPP/bitvector32_createmasks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CS/bitvector32_createmasks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/VB/bitvector32_createmasks.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`CreateMask()`數列中建立的第一個遮罩和`CreateMask(int)`所有後續的遮罩。Use `CreateMask()` to create the first mask in a series and `CreateMask(int)` for all subsequent masks. 可以建立多個遮罩，可參考相同的位元旗標。Multiple masks can be created to refer to the same bit flag. 產生的遮罩隔離中的只有一個位元旗標。The resulting mask isolates only one bit flag in the . 您可以結合使用位元 OR 運算，建立隔離的多個中的位元旗標遮罩遮罩。You can combine masks using the bitwise OR operation to create a mask that isolates multiple bit flags in the . 在使用遮罩設定區段可能會導致非預期的結果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和使用遮罩。The following code example shows how to create and use masks. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CPP/bitvector32_createmasks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CS/bitvector32_createmasks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/VB/bitvector32_createmasks.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是一種視窗到並所組成可以包含在指定的最大值的連續位元最小數目。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 比方說，包含最大值為 1 的區段組成只有一個位元，，而 5 與最大值的區段組成三個位元。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 您可以建立最大值是 1，以做為布林值，因此您就可以將整數和布林值儲存在相同。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . 如果區段已存在於，仍然可以存取這些章節; 不過，重疊的區段可能會導致非預期的結果。If sections already exist in the , those sections are still accessible; however, overlapping sections might cause unexpected results. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用為區段的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of sections. remarks.format: ## Remarks [區段] 屬性是索引子章節中，以設定和[int] 屬性是索引子為位元旗標設定。The [Section] property is the indexer for a that is set up as sections, and the [int] property is the indexer for a that is set up as bit flags. A是一種視窗到並所組成可以包含在指定的最大值的連續位元最小數目。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 比方說，包含最大值為 1 的區段組成只有一個位元，，而 5 與最大值的區段組成三個位元。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 您可以建立最大值是 1，以做為布林值，因此您就可以將整數和布林值儲存在相同。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。設定屬性，也是一種 o （1） 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [區段] 屬性是索引子章節中，以設定和[int] 屬性是索引子為位元旗標設定。The [Section] property is the indexer for a that is set up as sections, and the [int] property is the indexer for a that is set up as bit flags. 使用這個屬性上設定區段可能會導致非預期的結果。Using this property on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。設定屬性，也是一種 o （1） 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.
